index_description:
Aleksandr Perevalov is a researcher and PhD candidate.

He received his bachelor's degree in computer science at the Perm State Technical University (PSTU) in 2018 followed by his master's degree in computer and data science within the double-degree program between PSTU and Anhalt University of Applied Sciences (HSA) in 2020.

Aleksandr worked as a software engineer in Foresight LLC (2018-2020) and joined HSA again as a PhD student in August 2020. Currently he is holding the position of a research assistant at Leipzig University of Applied Sciences (HTWK Leipzig) and PhD candidate at HSA.
